segment.source: How to use the User Experience page in the IEAK 11 Customization Wizard to decide user interaction with the Setup process.
segment.target: How to use the User Experience page in the IEAK 11 Customization Wizard to decide user interaction with the Setup process.

segment.source: Use the User Experience page in the IEAK 11 Wizard (Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 for IT Pros)
segment.target: Use the User Experience page in the IEAK 11 Wizard (Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 for IT Pros)

segment.source: Use the User Experience page in the IEAK 11 Wizard
segment.target: Use the User Experience page in the IEAK 11 Wizard

segment.source: The User Experience page of the Internet Explorer Customization Wizard 11 lets you decide how much you want your employees to interact with the custom package’s Setup process.
segment.target: The User Experience page of the Internet Explorer Customization Wizard 11 lets you decide how much you want your employees to interact with the custom package’s Setup process.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: You’ll only see this page if you are running the Internal version of the Internet Explorer Customization Wizard 11.
segment.target: You’ll only see this page if you are running the Internal version of the Internet Explorer Customization Wizard 11.

segment.source: The customizations you make on this page only apply to Internet Explorer for the desktop on Windows 7.
segment.target: The customizations you make on this page only apply to Internet Explorer for the desktop on Windows 7.

segment.source: To use the User Experience page
segment.target: To use the User Experience page

segment.source: Choose how your employee should interact with Setup, including:
segment.target: Choose how your employee should interact with Setup, including:

segment.source: Interactive installation.
segment.target: Interactive installation.

segment.source: Lets your employees change installation options while installing your custom package.
segment.target: Lets your employees change installation options while installing your custom package.

segment.source: This experience shows all of the progress and error messages throughout the process.
segment.target: This experience shows all of the progress and error messages throughout the process.

segment.source: Hands-free installation.
segment.target: Hands-free installation.

segment.source: Lets you make all of the decisions for your employees.
segment.target: Lets you make all of the decisions for your employees.

segment.source: However, they’ll still see all of the progress and error messages throughout the process.
segment.target: However, they’ll still see all of the progress and error messages throughout the process.

segment.source: Completely silent installation.
segment.target: Completely silent installation.

segment.source: Lets you make all of the decisions for your employees and hides all of the progress and error messages.
segment.target: Lets you make all of the decisions for your employees and hides all of the progress and error messages.

segment.source: Because this mode is completely silent, if the installation fails, your employees won’t know and they won’t be able to run the installation package again.
segment.target: Because this mode is completely silent, if the installation fails, your employees won’t know and they won’t be able to run the installation package again.

segment.source: Both the hands-free and completely silent installation options will:
segment.target: Both the hands-free and completely silent installation options will:

segment.source: Answer prompts so Setup can continue.
segment.target: Answer prompts so Setup can continue.

segment.source: Accept the license agreement.
segment.target: Accept the license agreement.

segment.source: Determine that Internet Explorer 11 is installed and not just downloaded.
segment.target: Determine that Internet Explorer 11 is installed and not just downloaded.

segment.source: Perform your specific installation type.
segment.target: Perform your specific installation type.

segment.source: Install IE in the default location, unless it is already installed.
segment.target: Install IE in the default location, unless it is already installed.

segment.source: In that case, the new version of the browser is installed in the same location as the previous version.
segment.target: In that case, the new version of the browser is installed in the same location as the previous version.

segment.source: Choose if your employee’s device will restart at the end of Setup.
segment.target: Choose if your employee’s device will restart at the end of Setup.

segment.source: Default.
segment.target: Default.

segment.source: Prompts your employees to restart after installing IE.
segment.target: Prompts your employees to restart after installing IE.

segment.source: No restart.
segment.target: No restart.

segment.source: Doesn’t restart the computer after installing IE.
segment.target: Doesn’t restart the computer after installing IE.

segment.source: The employee will have to manually restart later.
segment.target: The employee will have to manually restart later.

segment.source: Force restart.
segment.target: Force restart.

segment.source: Automatically restarts the computer after installing IE.
segment.target: Automatically restarts the computer after installing IE.

segment.source: Click Next to go to the Browser User Interface page or Back to go to the Internal Install page.
segment.target: Click Next to go to the Browser User Interface page or Back to go to the Internal Install page.
